name: MangoSpring
tag_list: enterprise, communication, collaboration, web2-0, social, micro-blogging, enterprise2-0, networking, social-networking, project-management, tasks, task-management, event, event-management, ideas, idea-management, performance-tracking, employee-recognition
overview:
Founded in 2007, MangoSpring revolutionizes the way employees work together. MangoSpring builds business applications called MangoApps that fulfill the most important needs of the corporate workflow including: project, document, task, idea and event management.

Each MangoApp is built on MangoSpringâ€™s next generation Employee Collaboration Platform. MangoApps seamlessly combines enterprise microblogging with traditional collaboration methods, such as enterprise instant messaging, to deliver a revolutionary business collaboration experience.

MangoApps have already been adopted by leading companies in a wide range of industries, including technology, media, finance, health, education, non-profit and government. For more information about MangoApps or MangoSpring, please visit www.mangospring.com.
